per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=zoom=1.000;
per_frame_9=musictime=musictime+vol;
per_frame_10=q4=sin(musictime*0.02)*0.3;

per_frame_13=
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=
per_pixel_1=zoom=.988;
per_pixel_2=kdx=dx;//////////////////////////////////////////

per_pixel_4=ksx=sx;

per_pixel_6=krt=rot;

per_pixel_8=kcx=cx;
per_pixel_9=kcy=cy;
per_pixel_10=kwp=warp;
per_pixel_11=
per_pixel_12=dx=0;
per_pixel_13=dy=0;
per_pixel_14=sx=1;
per_pixel_15=sy=1;
per_pixel_16=rot=0;
per_pixel_17=zoom=1;
per_pixel_18=cx=.5;
per_pixel_19=cy=.5;
per_pixel_20=warp=0;/////////////////////////////////////////////////////
per_pixel_21=
per_pixel_22=rot=rot+0.16*sin(time*-3.3+rad*11)*(1.3-rad);
per_pixel_23=zoom=zoom+0.04*sin(time*1.2+ang*6.28*3);
per_pixel_24=///////////////////////////////////////
per_pixel_25=cr1=10*.01;
per_pixel_26=cr2=0*.01;
per_pixel_27=crx=cr2-cr1;
per_pixel_28=ci=rad;
per_pixel_29=cb=.25  ;
per_pixel_30=crs=2;
per_pixel_31=cr=pow(sin(ci*6.3-(cb*6.3))/2+.5,crs)*crx+cr1;
per_pixel_32=cqr=if( above (ci,.25+cb),cr,crx+cr1);crr=if( below(ci,1.5),cqr,crx+cr1);
per_pixel_33=jx1=crr;
per_pixel_34=kx1=1-crr;
per_pixel_35=
per_pixel_36=jdx=dx;
per_pixel_37=jdy=dy;
per_pixel_38=jsx=sx;
per_pixel_39=jsy=sy;
per_pixel_40=jrt=rot;
per_pixel_41=jzm=zoom;
per_pixel_42=jcx=cx;
per_pixel_43=jcy=cy;
per_pixel_44=jwp=warp;
per_pixel_45=
per_pixel_46=dx=(jx1*jdx+kx1*kdx);
per_pixel_47=dy=(jx1*jdy+kx1*kdy);
per_pixel_48=sx=(jx1*jsx+kx1*ksx);
per_pixel_49=sy=(jx1*jsy+kx1*ksy);
per_pixel_50=rot=(jx1*jrt+kx1*krt);
per_pixel_51=zoom=(jx1*jzm+kx1*kzm);
per_pixel_52=cx=(jx1*jcx+kx1*kcx);
per_pixel_53=cy=(jx1*jcy+kx1*kcy);
per_pixel_54=warp=(jx1*jwp+kx1*kwp);////////////////////////////////////////////////////
per_pixel_55=
